channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 中国共产党的官方报纸称，中国最高金融监督机构誓言继续开展一场运动，以确保金融业坚持共产党的价值观并服务于经济，同时避免 "过度 "和 "鲁莽 "的风险。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: China's top financial watchdogs vowed to keep up a campaign to ensure that the sector adheres to Communist Party values and serves the economy while avoiding ‘excessive’ and ‘reckless’ risks, the party's official newspaper said. More here: reut.rs/4bJVFKn

item.title: Breakingviews - 矿商必和必拓将尾部风险浮出水面
item.description: Breakingviews - Miner BHP brings tail risks up to the surface reut.rs/3T3Wp5N reut.rs/3T3Wp5N

item.title: 随着核燃料原料价格的飙升，投资银行高盛（Goldman Sachs）和麦格理（Macquarie）以及一些对冲基金正将自己定位为从新崛起的铀行业中获益。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Investment banks Goldman Sachs and Macquarie as well as some hedge funds are positioning themselves to reap the benefits of a newly buoyant uranium sector as prices of the nuclear fuel ingredient spike. More here: reut.rs/3T5VDFA

item.title: 一位负责货币市场的韩国高级官员表示，他的团队正在与证券结算机构欧洲清算公司（Euroclear）进行谈判，旨在促进外国投资者使用韩元，最终吸引更多资本流入。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: A senior South Korean official in charge of currency markets said his team was in talks with securities settlement house Euroclear, aiming to boost foreign investors' access to the won currency and eventually attract more capital inflows. More here: reut.rs/3I6BDMD

item.title: 中国市场连续三年的亏损和华盛顿的反华言论，并没有阻止一些美国资产管理公司推出他们希望在中国股市反弹时能够兴旺发达的产品。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Three straight years of losses from Chinese markets and anti-Beijing rhetoric from Washington have not deterred some US asset managers from introducing products they hope will thrive if Chinese stocks rebound. More here: reut.rs/3SFoaAe

item.title: 独家报道：价值 450 亿美元的英国工作场所养老基金 Nest 预计将私人资产的持有量提高到其投资组合的 30%，这是英国大型退休计划进军另类投资的最重要举措之一。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Exclusive: Nest, a $45 billion UK workplace pension fund, expects to ramp up private assets holdings to as much as 30% of its portfolio, in one of the most significant moves into alternative investments by a large UK retirement scheme. More here: reut.rs/4bM6NXo

item.title: 观看：沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）支持的美国消费银行Capital One计划收购美国信用卡发行商发现金融服务公司（Discover Financial Services），这是一项价值353亿美元的全股票交易，两家公司表示将打造一个全球支付巨头。
item.description: WATCH: Warren Buffett-backed US consumer bank Capital One plans to acquire US credit card issuer Discover Financial Services in an all-stock transaction valued at $35.3 billion to create a global payments giant, the companies said reut.rs/3wxqS3a

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司因悉尼赌场第二次调查而创下历史新低
item.description: Australia's Star Entertainment hits record low on second inquiry into Sydney casino reut.rs/3OOYJv8

item.title: 观看：美国政府向 GlobalFoundries 公司拨款 15 亿美元。这家芯片制造商将在纽约州马耳他建造一座新的制造工厂，并扩大在那里和佛蒙特州伯灵顿的现有业务。
item.description: WATCH: The US government is awarding $1.5 billion to GlobalFoundries. The chipmaker will build a new manufacturing facility in Malta, New York, as well as expand existing operations there and in Burlington, Vermont reut.rs/42KxDuC

item.title: 随着中国政府加大力度刺激信贷需求并重振房地产市场，中国在每月固定利率会议上下调抵押贷款基准参考利率的幅度超出预期。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: China cut the benchmark reference rate for mortgages at a monthly fixing by more than expected, as authorities ramped up efforts to stimulate credit demand and revive the property market. More here: reut.rs/48DkSUh

item.title: 中国外交部长在访问西班牙期间表示，中国愿与欧盟一道，维护自由贸易，践行多边主义，推动建设平等有序的多极世界和包容普惠的经济全球化。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: China is ready to work with the European Union to uphold free trade, practice multilateralism, and promote an equal and orderly multi-polar world and inclusive economic globalization, its foreign minister said during a visit to Spain. More here: reut.rs/48hZWlv

item.title: 由沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）支持的美国消费贷款公司 Capital One 表示，它将收购信用卡发行商发现金融服务公司（Discover Financial Services），这是一项全股票交易，价值 353 亿美元。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description: Capital One, a US consumer lender backed by Warren Buffett, said that it will acquire credit card issuer Discover Financial Services in an all-stock transaction valued at $35.3 billion. More here: reut.rs/3ULj3RR

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司因悉尼赌场第二次调查而创下历史新低
item.description: Australia's Star Entertainment hits record low on second inquiry into Sydney casino reut.rs/42HcoKp

item.title: 瑞典奥斯卡地产公司称首席执行官和首席财务官辞职
item.description: Sweden's Oscar Properties says CEO and CFO resign reut.rs/42NONaE

item.title: 观看：美国政府将向芯片制造商 GlobalFoundries 拨款 15 亿美元，以促进国内半导体生产。
item.description: WATCH: The US government is awarding $1.5 billion to chip maker GlobalFoundries in a bid to boost domestic semiconductor production reut.rs/42KxDuC

item.title: 观看：美国将放宽尾气排放规定，放缓电动汽车过渡到 2030 年的速度
item.description: WATCH: US to soften tailpipe rules, slow EV transition through 2030 reut.rs/48uXCru

item.title: 观看：任天堂股价因 Switch 后续机型推迟发布的报道而下滑
item.description: WATCH: Shares of Nintendo slide on reports of delayed Switch successor release reut.rs/49FrFNX

item.title: 慕尼黑的山峦和科技吸引着来自法兰克福的大银行
item.description: Munich's mountains and tech tempt big banks from Frankfurt reut.rs/3I4C1et

item.title: 观看：拜登政府表示，美国政府将向 GlobalFoundries 公司拨款 15 亿美元，用于扩大半导体生产，以加强国内供应链。
item.description: WATCH: The US government is awarding $1.5 billion to GlobalFoundries to expand semiconductor production, the Biden administration said, in a bid to strengthen domestic supply chains reut.rs/42KxDuC

item.title: 观看：乔-拜登总统的政府可能会软化为减排而设定的苛刻目标
item.description: WATCH: President Joe Biden's administration is likely to soften tough targets set for cutting emissions reut.rs/48uXCru

item.title: 瑞典奥斯卡地产公司称首席执行官和首席财务官辞职
item.description: Sweden's Oscar Properties says CEO and CFO resign reut.rs/4bFxw7R

item.title: 观看：媒体报道称任天堂老旧游戏机 Switch 的换代产品将推迟上市，任天堂股价早盘受挫
item.description: WATCH: Nintendo stock hit in early trading after media reports that a replacement for its aging Switch console will be delayed reut.rs/49FrFNX

item.title: 印度科塔克马恒达银行任命新高管
item.description: India's Kotak Mahindra Bank names new senior executives reut.rs/3T1WNlo

item.title: 观看：在美国，汽车制造商可能不必这么快就实现绿色环保。@路透社消息称，拜登政府将淡化减排的艰难目标
item.description: WATCH: Car makers may not have to go green quite so fast in the US. @Reuters sources say the Biden administration is set to water down tough targets set for cutting emissions reut.rs/48uXCru

item.title: 慕尼黑的山峦和科技吸引着来自法兰克福的大银行
item.description: Munich's mountains and tech tempt big banks from Frankfurt reut.rs/3wqLfiQ

item.title: 观看：任天堂新游戏机推迟上市的消息传出后，股价早盘暴跌逾 6
item.description: WATCH: Nintendo stock tumbled over 6% in early trades after report of new console delay reut.rs/49FrFNX

item.title: 陷入困境的德国房东阿德勒董事长辞职
item.description: Chairman of troubled German landlord Adler resigns reut.rs/3T36fov

item.title: 印度科塔克马恒达银行任命新高管
item.description: India's Kotak Mahindra Bank names new senior executives reut.rs/3I3BcT5

item.title: 桑坦德银行将回购 15.7 亿美元股票并提高股息
item.description: Santander to buy back $1.57 billion in shares, raise dividend reut.rs/3SIuk2r

item.title: 观看：两位消息人士告诉 @路透社：美国总统乔-拜登的政府将放宽到 2030 年的拟议年限要求，该计划旨在积极减少尾气排放并提高电动汽车的销量。
item.description: WATCH: US President Joe Biden's administration is set to ease proposed yearly requirements through 2030 of its sweeping plan to aggressively cut tailpipe emissions and ramp up electric vehicle sales, two sources told @Reuters reut.rs/48uXCru
